info.title: Hacking the core
info.shortdesc: Take a deep dive into core Hippo CMS development.
info.introduction: Hippo CMS is open source software. All source code is available from our SVN repository under the Apache license. This section explains how to get the source code, how to build it, and how to set up your IDE. In addition, the architecture and the conceptual ideas behind it are explained in detail.
